item.description:
Permaculture group members in Buxton, Hollis and Gorham are invited to join in a permaculture potluck closer to home in order to meet some members nearby and, possibly, see if there is interest in some ongoing activities (tool-sharing, work parties, bartering, etc.).

For this session we'll be meeting at the home of Cheryl, Kirk and Jayne in Buxton to see how they're doing with the early stages of implementing a permaculture plan for their property and how they're getting on with their energy-efficient home.

  • 6:00 Optional early arrival to look around the outside of the property
  • 6:30 Potluck Supper (Bring a dish or beverage to share and your own potluck kit - plate/bowl/utensils/cup)
  • 7:30 After-supper conversation and talk about options for ongoing Buxton/Hollis/Gorham activities
  • 8:30 Wrapping up...

Space is limited but if this fills up, please add your name to the waiting list.  Hopefully this will be the first of several "local" meetups for our group!

__________________________

Interested in hosting a small-group neighborhood or outlying town meetup (10-15 people) at your home?  Several members have expressed interest in this as a way to connect more locally, coordinate some activities closer to home, etc.  Contact LisaF to get it on the schedule.
item.how_to_find_us: Come down the driveway and you'll be directed to spots!

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Permaculture Potluck (Buxton, Hollis & Gorham Members)
